mapper.select: select *, date_format(event_start,"%Y-%m-%d") start, date_format(event_end,"%Y-%m-%d") end from tbl_even

select *, date_format(event_start,"%Y-%m-%d") start, date_format(event_end,"%Y-%m-%d") end from tbl_event where #{event_start} >= event_start and #{event_start} <= event_end and use_work_num=${use_work_num} order by event_start
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_event(use_id, use_work_num, event_name, event_start, event_end) values(#{use_id}, #{use_work_num}, #{event_name}, #{event_start}, #{event_end});
mapper.update: update tbl_event set event_name=#{event_name}, event_start=#{event_start}, event_end=#{event_end} where event_id=#{event_id};
